My goal now is to become the highest giver ever, and I'm committed to supporting and helping as many people as possible along the way.

name: Krishnakumar Nataraj
top_product: Comprehensive U.S. and Indian tax preparation services, including Forms 3520, 5471, 8621, 2555, 1065, 1120-S, 1116, and more. GST filing and advisory services tailored to Indian nationals and businesses. Personal financial planning strategies aimed at helping clients reach their financial goals.
ideal_referral: U.S. expatriates and Indian nationals seeking tax compliance and financial planning support. Professionals and businesses requiring assistance with U.S. tax filings, Indian tax returns, GST compliance, and bank loan projects. Individuals aiming to achieve their financial goals through strategic personal financial planning.
top_problem_solved: One of my most rewarding experiences was helping a client avoid a substantial $30,000 IRS penalty. The client had been facing this penalty due to a tax oversight, which could have had serious financial repercussions. Leveraging my expertise as an IRS-licensed Enrolled Agent, I drafted a detailed letter to the IRS, applying for a First-Time Abatement to waive the penalty. The outcome was successful—the penalty was waived, saving the client $30,000. This experience not only reinforced the importance of knowing IRS guidelines but also showed the difference that knowledgeable representation can make. The client was immensely grateful, and this experience reminded me of the powerful impact that a specialized skill set can have on a client’s financial well-being.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my proudest achievements as a BNI member has been the opportunity to connect with over 50 CPAs specializing in my field. Through BNI, I’ve built a powerful network of like-minded professionals who share a commitment to delivering top-notch tax and financial services. Attending leadership meetings has allowed me to strengthen these connections and collaborate on a deeper level. As a licensed IRS Enrolled Agent based in Coimbatore and the Greater Coimbatore area, I offer a unique selling proposition in the niche of U.S. expatriate taxation. My expertise allows me to provide specialized support for U.S. expats with complex compliance needs, making me a valuable resource for clients and BNI members alike. BNI has been instrumental in helping me expand my reach, refine my skills, and build a truly specialized practice.

With his encouragement, she embraced a new journey of personal and professional growth. She soon became actively involved in BNI, taking on key leadership roles such as Trainer, Chapter Secretary, Vice President, and President. Her involvement in BNI extended beyond personal growth — she continuously referred and supported other entrepreneurs, helping them achieve substantial success. In one remarkable instance, she completed a major project for a client who later became a repeat customer and referred her to several other businesses in their network. This single referral resulted in a 100% business growth for those companies within just one year.

name: Muthukumar Mylsamy
my_business:
Fingro Services started with a simple yet powerful idea: helping individuals grow their wealth through informed and strategic investing. What began as a personal journey in 2012, when our founder, Muthukumar, started investing in mutual funds with a deep passion for financial planning, soon evolved into a trusted advisory service.
From 2012 to 2017, Muthukumar guided friends and family on investment strategies, purely out of passion—without any monetary benefits. His ability to simplify complex financial concepts and help others achieve their financial goals led to growing demand for his expertise. Many wanted him to not just advise but also execute investments on their behalf.
Recognizing the need for structured, professional financial services, Fingro Services was officially established in 2018. Since then, we have expanded beyond mutual fund advisory to offer a comprehensive suite of financial solutions, including:
•	Mutual Fund Advisory
•	Health & Term Insurance
•	Gold & Silver Inv
top_product: MUTUAL FUNDS
